Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent an adventurer playing the exciting game of "Fly-Away". A player has a location (of class Room) and is facing a particular direction with objects in backpack.
    Version:
    18.03.15
    Author:
    Robert Topp, 733474

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Construct a player with "null" location facing east with no items in backpack
